exerelin_abilities.followMeTooltip1: Nearby non-busy fleets belonging to your faction or an alliance member will follow you around for $numDays days.
exerelin_abilities.followMeTooltip2: Only works on patrol, strike and defense fleets, and the fleet must have seen you with your transponder on.

exerelin_alliances.intelDesc: The $alliance alliance is present in the Sector. It has $numMembers members, with $numMarkets markets of total size $marketSizeSum.
exerelin_alliances.intelDissolvedDesc: The $alliance alliance has been dissolved. Its members have gone their separate ways.
exerelin_alliances.intelDescPeaceYes: The alliance $alliance has voted to make peace with $theOtherParty.
exerelin_alliances.intelDescPeaceNo: The alliance $alliance has voted against making peace with $theOtherParty.
exerelin_alliances.intelDescWarYes: The alliance $alliance has voted to declare war on $theOtherParty.
exerelin_alliances.intelDescWarNo: The alliance $alliance has voted against declaring war on $theOtherParty.
exerelin_alliances.defiesDecisionWar: $defying defies the decision and refuses to declare war!
exerelin_alliances.defiesDecisionPeace: $defying defies the decision and continues the war!
exerelin_alliances.defyDecisionWar: $defying defy the decision and refuses to declare war!
exerelin_alliances.defyDecisionPeace: $defying defy the decision and continue the war!
exerelin_alliances.numAlliances: There are $numAlliances alliance(s) in the Sector

exerelin_agents.resultSuccessDetected: Your $agentType has $resultVerb their mission, but was detected in the process.
exerelin_agents.resultFailureDetected: Your $agentType has $resultVerb in their mission and was caught!
exerelin_agents.destabilizeText2: fired into a crowd at a public venue
exerelin_agents.destabilizeText6: released nerve gas into a recreational area

nex_bombardment.satBombWarning: An atrocity of this scale can not be hidden, and will make the following factions hostile:
nex_bombardment.satBombWarningSmall: An atrocity of this scale can not be hidden. $market is sufficiently low-populated that the reputational impacts will be limited, but the following factions will nevertheless be angry:
nex_bombardment.satBombWarningAllHostile: An atrocity of this scale can not be hidden, but any factions that would be dismayed by such actions are already hostile to you.
nex_bombardment.satBombWarningVengeful: Due to their hatred of $theFaction, the following factions can be expected to overlook your crime:

exerelin_credits.contribution_darkRevenant: Much coding help; compatibility with SS+ and descendant mods
exerelin_credits.contribution_fractalSoftworks: The Fractal Softworks team that made Starsector

exerelin_diplomacy.intelRepResultPositive: Relations between $faction1 and $faction2 improved by $deltaAbs, to $newRelationStr.
exerelin_diplomacy.intelRepResultNegative: Relations between $faction1 and $faction2 reduced by $deltaAbs, to $newRelationStr.
exerelin_diplomacy.player_peace_msg: You are no longer hostile to $factionOrAlliance

exerelin_factions.exerelinFactionInsuranceDesc: You have received $paid from $theEmployer to help cover your losses in the recent battle.
exerelin_factions.exerelinFactionInsuranceUnpaidDesc: Due to your bad conduct in their eyes, $theEmployer have refused to make any insurance payments.
exerelin_factions.intel_descEliminated: $TheFaction $hasOrHave lost their last stronghold of $market, and their surviving fleets are taking refuge elsewhere. Their ambitions in the Sector are clearly over.
exerelin_factions.intel_descSpawned: $TheFaction $isOrAre moving into the Sector, with a foothold in $market.
exerelin_factions.intel_descRespawned: $TheFaction $hasOrHave regained a foothold in the Sector, at $market.
exerelin_factions.intel_descWon: With the defeat of $theFaction, your $playerFaction reigns supreme over the Sector. Congratulations!
exerelin_factions.intel_descLost: With your faction beaten and scattered, you are on your own with whatever allies you still have or can cobble up. It may be time to find greener pastures elsewhere.

nex_fleetIntel.title: $action: $market
nex_fleetIntel.desc: $TheFaction $isOrAre $actioning $market in the $location, held by $theTargetFaction. The $forceType $isOrAre projected to be $strDesc.
nex_fleetIntel.strCompare: Compared to the defenses, $theAction's space forces are %s and its ground forces are %s.
nex_fleetIntel.predictionDefeatInOrbit: $TheAction is likely to be defeated in orbit.
nex_fleetIntel.predictionDefeatOnGround: $TheAction is likely to be largely repelled by the ground defences.
nex_fleetIntel.predictionBombard: $theForceType is likely to resort to tactical bombardment.
nex_fleetIntel.outcomeNoLongerHostile: As $target's current faction is not currently hostile, $theAction has been cancelled.
nex_fleetIntel.outcomeNoLongerExists: $target has been destroyed by another hostile party.
nex_fleetIntel.stageOrganizeUnknown: $TheAction is currently in the planning stages.
nex_fleetIntel.stageOrganizeDisrupted: $TheAction has been disrupted in the planning stages and will not happen.
nex_fleetIntel.stageAssembleUnknown: $TheForceType $isOrAre currently assembling at an unknown location.
nex_fleetIntel.stageAssembleFail: $TheForceType $hasOrHave failed to successfully assemble at the rendezvous point.
nex_fleetIntel.stageActionDefeatedGround: $TheForceType $hasOrHave been repelled by the ground defenses of $market.
nex_fleetIntel.stageActionDefeatedSpace: $TheForceType $hasOrHave been defeated by the defenders of of $market.

nex_fleetRequest.fleetSpawnMessage: The fleet is being prepared for launch.
nex_fleetRequest.tooltipInsufficientFunds: Dispatching this fleet requires $cost credits. You only have $credits credits.
nex_fleetRequest.proceedConfirmNonHostile: $TheFaction is not currently hostile, but will be if you launch this fleet. Are you sure you wish to do this?

exerelin_invasion.nonHostileWarning: $TheFaction $isOrAre not currently hostile. An invasion is a major enough hostile action that it can't be concealed, regardless of transponder status.
exerelin_invasion.takeForSelfWarning:
You can take $market as a personal holding, but this will not please your current faction.

Proceed?
exerelin_invasion.invadeHasStation: The orbital station must be destroyed before an invasion is possible.
exerelin_invasion.intelDesc: $TheFaction $isOrAre invading $market in the $location, held by $theTargetFaction. The invasion forces are projected to be $strDesc.
exerelin_invasion.intelPredictionBombard: The invasion force is likely to resort to tactical bombardment.
exerelin_invasion.intelOutcomeNoLongerHostile: As $target's current faction is not currently hostile, the invasion has been cancelled.
exerelin_invasion.intelOutcomeNoLongerExists: $target has been destroyed by another hostile party. There is nothing left to invade.
exerelin_invasion.intelStageAction: The invasion force is currently in-system.
exerelin_invasion.intelStageActionDefeatedGround: The invasion forces have been repelled by the ground defenses of $market.
exerelin_invasion.intelStageActionDefeatedSpace: The invasion force has been defeated by the defenders of of $market.
exerelin_invasion.insufficientForces: You do not have the forces to carry out an effective invasion.
exerelin_invasion.roundResult_win: Your forces overwhelm the enemy, seizing control of $market. Surviving defenders are surrendering.
exerelin_invasion.roundResult_good: Your forces make excellent progress, pushing back the enemy rapidly.
exerelin_invasion.roundResult_ok: Your forces slowly but surely gain ground against the enemy, driving them back.
exerelin_invasion.roundResult_bad: Your forces encounter fierce resistance from the defenders of $market and make little headway.
exerelin_invasion.roundResult_lose: The defenders counterattack and eliminate your ground forces.
exerelin_invasion.noLosses: Your forces have not suffered any losses.
exerelin_invasion.endMsgLoot: The invasion forces captured a quantity of various items, as well as some credits.
exerelin_invasion.endMsgNoLoot: The invasion did not lead to the capture of a meaningful quantity of goods.

exerelin_markets.intelCapturePlayerDesc: $NewFaction $hasOrHave captured $market (size $size) in the $location from the $oldFaction, under the command of $player.
exerelin_markets.transferMarketWarning: Are you sure you wish to transfer $market to $theFaction?
exerelin_markets.transferMarketRep: At the current stability, transferring $market will earn $repChange reputation with the recipient faction.
exerelin_markets.stabilizeHeader: Stabilizing $market will earn $reputation reputation with $theFaction, cost $credits and require the following commodities:

exerelin_mining.miningToolsListHeader: The following mining ships and weapons exist in the Sector:
exerelin_mining.miningToolsListAddendum: Fighter wings and modules with the appropriate weapons count towards their parent ship's mining strength. Built-in weapons are also counted.
exerelin_mining.insufficientMachineryWarning: Your $shipOrFleet does not have enough heavy machinery to work at full capacity.

exerelin_ngc.ownFactionDisabledTooltip: No planet to spawn from in non-random sector, use free start instead
exerelin_ngc.freeStartTooltip: Own faction, but with no starting planet; you're on your own.
exerelin_ngc.populatedSystemsTooltip: This is a target number of systems. Actual populated system count may be more or less than this.
exerelin_ngc.populatedPlanetsTooltip: Will fill new systems if specified number of populated systems is insufficient.
exerelin_ngc.stationsTooltip: Will fill new systems if specified number of populated systems is insufficient.
exerelin_ngc.randomizeFactionsTooltip: Every faction has a 50% chance to be enabled (except independents, which will not be toggled from their current setting).

exerelin_officers.battle_noReportIn: Your $officers did not report in after the battle
exerelin_officers.battle_casualties: Your $officer was listed among the casualties
exerelin_officers.battle_casualties_plural: Your $officers were listed among the casualties
exerelin_officers.confirmDeath: The post-action report confirms that your $officers didn't make it
exerelin_officers.savedFromWreckage: Your $officer was saved from the wreckage
exerelin_officers.savedFromWreckagePlural: Your $officers were saved from the wreckage
exerelin_officers.noOfficersDeadForNow: No officers have died under your command... so far
exerelin_officers.noOfficersDead: No officers have died under your command.

exerelin_raid.stageOrganizeRemnant: $TheAction is currently being planned at a base in the $location.
exerelin_raid.conditionListHeader: The following hostile factions have active raids in the system:

exerelin_reinitScreen.introText: You have loaded Nexerelin into an existing save. Please configure starting options:
exerelin_reinitScreen.allowRespawnNonOriginal: Allow respawn for factions not currently present

exerelin_superweapon.successText: The missile scores a direct hit! $market has taken severe damage.

nex_vengeance.intelDesc0: Due to your reputation with $theFaction, $aFleetType is being prepared, assigned to seek you out and eliminate you if possible.
nex_vengeance.intelDesc1: Due to your bitter hostilities with $theFaction, $aFleetType is being prepared, ordered to hunt your fleet down and destroy you.
nex_vengeance.intelDesc2: Due to your infamous and vengeful conflict with $theFaction, $aFleetType is being prepared, their directive being to find you and kill you by any means necessary.
nex_vengeance.intelStatusAssembling: The fleet will launch from $market in $days.
nex_vengeance.intelStatusActive: The fleet is currently active and will pursue you for $duration.
nex_vengeance.intelStatusFailedToSpawn: The fleet has failed to spawn. The event is now over.
nex_vengeance.intelStatusExpired: The fleet is returning to base.
nex_vengeance.intelStatusNoLongerHostile: $TheFaction $isOrAre no longer hostile. The vengeance mission has been terminated.
nex_vengeance.intelStatusUnknown: The mission has been called off for unspecified reasons.

exerelin_victoryScreen.victory_conquest: Congratulations! $TheFaction have crushed all opposition and now reigns supreme over the $clusterName cluster!
Congratulations! $TheFaction have crushed all opposition and now reigns supreme over the Sector!
exerelin_victoryScreen.victory_diplomatic: Congratulations! $TheFaction and their allies control the Sector!
exerelin_victoryScreen.victory_conquest_ally: Congratulations! Your ally $theFaction have crushed all opposition and now reigns supreme over the Sector!
exerelin_victoryScreen.victory_diplomatic_ally: Congratulations! You have joined $theFaction and their other allies in controlling the Sector!
exerelin_victoryScreen.defeat_conquest: Alas, $theFaction have conquered the Sector. All your efforts have come to naught.
exerelin_victoryScreen.defeat_diplomatic: $TheFaction and their allies now dominate the Sector. Unfortunately, you are not one of them...
exerelin_victoryScreen.retired: You have chosen to retire prematurely. Yet the struggles of the Sector continue, on and on...
exerelin_victoryScreen.intelDescConquest: $TheFaction $hasOrHave crushed all possible competition. Their rule over the Sector is now undisputed.
exerelin_victoryScreen.intelDescDiplomatic: $TheFaction and their allies are the only remaining powers in the Sector. Peace has come to this corner of the galaxy, at least for now.
exerelin_victoryScreen.intelDescRetired: You, $playerName, have chosen to retire from the game. The conflicts of the Sector will have to unfold without you.

exerelin_misc.counterInsurgencyRep: At your current relationship with $theFaction, payment for deliveries is $mult of current per-unit price.
exerelin_misc.counterInsurgencyRepFixed: Payment for deliveries is $mult of current per-unit price.
exerelin_misc.aiCoresSelect: Select AI cores to turn in
exerelin_misc.aiCoresMsg1: Compared to dealing with other factions, turning AI cores in to $faction will result in:
exerelin_misc.aiCoresMsg2: If you turn in the selected AI cores, you will receive a %s bounty and your standing with $faction will improve by %s points.
exerelin_misc.blueprintSwapMsg: The selected blueprints are worth $points points.
exerelin_misc.errorLazyLib:
Nexerelin requires LazyLib to function!
Get it at fractalsoftworks.com/forum/index.php?topic=5444.0
exerelin_misc.errorOfficerMaxLevel:
Officer max level in config is over 29 (current: $currMax)
This risks a hang during gameplay.
See http://fractalsoftworks.com/forum/index.php?topic=13195.0 for more details.
